about.title: About Global Relation Provisional Fund
about.description: Global Relation Provisional Fund (GRPF) is a community-based financial organization established to provide financial security and growth opportunities for our 41 dedicated members.
about.missionDesc: To provide financial stability and growth opportunities for our Family members
about.growthDesc: Steady financial growth and member satisfaction
about.storyParagraph1: Global Relation Provisional Fund was founded by 3-4 dedicated family members in Gokarna through Saturday discussions in 2076 B.S. What started as informal conversations about financial security grew into a structured family-based financial organization.
about.storyParagraph2: Initially beginning with 7-8 committed family members, our fund has grown steadily to encompass 41 members, all connected through family bonds. Our organization operates on the principles of mutual cooperation, transparency, and collective financial growth within our extended family network.
about.storyParagraph3: With 10 founding members leading the way and 31 family members joining our mission, we continue to strengthen our financial foundation while ensuring fair distribution of profits and maintaining sustainable growth for all family members. Our journey from a small family discussion to a thriving financial community reflects our commitment to family unity and financial prosperity.
